description: Make this healthier brunch platter the next time you have lots of little mouths to feed. There's fruit, veggies, wholegrains, yoghurt and muesli.
name: Kids' Healthier Brunch Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 Woolworths 7 seeds & grains hi-fibre low GI mini loaf

recipeInstructions.text: Place avocado in a small bowl. Place muesli in a small bowl. Place bread, yoghurt mixture, avocado and muesli on a platter. Arrange carrot, tomato, capsicum, cucumber, egg, mango, blueberries and raspberries around bowls. Drizzle yoghurt mixture with honey. Serve.

Place avocado in a small bowl. Place muesli in a small bowl. Place bread, yoghurt mixture, avocado and muesli on a platter. Arrange carrot, tomato, capsicum, cucumber, egg, mango, blueberries and raspberries around bowls. Drizzle yoghurt mixture with honey. Serve.
